summary: In Oklahoma, outlaw Belle Starr joins the Dalton gang but she causes a romantic rivalry and a rift between the gang members, especially on the eve of the planned robbery of a bank where a posse is secretly waiting in ambush.
cast: Jane Russell|George Brent|Scott Brady|Forrest Tucker|Andy Devine|Jack Lambert|John Litel|Ray Teal|Rory Mallinson|Mike Ragan|Roy Barcroft|Ned Davenport|Dick Elliott|Gene Roth|Stanley Andrews|Gregg Barton|Hank Bell|Rodney Bell|Ralph Bucko|Jess Cavin|George Chesebro|Iron Eyes Cody|Tex Cooper|Art Dillard|Frank Ellis|Franklyn Farnum|Raoul Freeman|Chick Hannan|Jack Kenny|Rex Lease|Pierce Lyden|Kenneth MacDonald|Dennis Moore|Charles Morton|Jimmy Noel|George Plues|Paul Power|Tom Smith|Charles Soldani|Glenn Strange
title: La bella de Montana
